parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The category of the disk.

*   cloud_efficiency: ultra disk.
*   cloud_ssd: all-flash disk.
*   local_hdd: local HDD.
*   local_ssd: local SSD.

parameters.name: DiskChargeType
parameters.description:
The billing method.

*   prePay: subscription.
*   postpay: pay-as-you-go.

parameters.name: DiskType
parameters.description:
The purchase method of the disk. Valid values:

*   ServiceDisk: The disk is purchased when ENS is activated.
*   ResoureDisk: The disk is purchased when the instance is created.
*   PostPayDisk: The disk is separately purchased.

parameters.name: EnsRegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the edge node.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The instance to which the disk is attached.

parameters.name: OrderByParams
parameters.description: The order in which you want to sort the returned data. Example: {"EnsRegionId":"desc"}. By default, the nodes are sorted by IDs in descending order.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The number of the page to return. Pages start from page **1**.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Maximum value: **50**.

Default value: **10**.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the disk. Valid values:

*   In-use: The disk is in use.
*   Available: The disk can be attached.
*   Attaching: The disk is being attached.
*   Detaching: The disk is being detached.
*   Creating: The image is being created.
*   ReIniting: The disk is being reset.
*   Deleting: The disk is being released.
*   Deleted: The disk is released.
*   Expiring: The disk is about to expire.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the disk. Valid values:

*   system: system disk.
*   data: data disk.
